html:
8.12.20  10:45 am   Do you let the good and bad feelings talk to each other or are you the middleman?

      i am middle person for sure, but i do my best to stay out of the way

8.12.20  10:45 am   Thoughts on concrete?

      so smooth

8.12.20  10:34 am   the earth is a donut
Change my mind

      it's 2 donuts

8.12.20  10:26 am   8.11.20  9:50 am So why did you change the key from G major  to A major?

      most songs with vocals are put to a 'key test' immediately before recording, to see what key sounds best for the singer's voice (in this case me). it was probably written in a library or something (also by me), so it was not firmly vocal tested at that time

8.12.20  10:16 am   how to make music?

      impossible. it can't be done

8.12.20  10:16 am   Opinion on shoes

      if you see an unidentified object, it might be a shoe

8.12.20  10:12 am   how to effectively find the needle in the haystack

      magnets?

8.12.20  10:08 am   whats your favorite book

      what the heck is a book

8.12.20  10:04 am   thoughts on gravity?

      it's pretty good

8.12.20  9:57 am   when are you going to be born?

      soon

8.12.20  9:00 am   What happened after you posted the might quit video?

      i tried to make another music video, even quicker (1 week) but instead it took a little longer, plus when i started the graphics portion i decided to re-invent everything right quick

8.12.20  8:51 am   Hey I need to ask u this: what were those glasses in that unboxing video?

     glasses, you nailed it

      What were they from?

     glasses store, probably

8.12.20  8:22 am   why do elevators go down sometimes 

      so they can get ready to elevate all over again

8.12.20  7:35 am   is life real?

      yes although i admit it is hard to believe. despite the fact that belief is only made possible by life

8.12.20  7:33 am   What's the name of your favorite bedtime story when you were a child? 

      waltz of the flowers

8.12.20  7:10 am   how do i apply for a job and actually get the job?

      apply for way too many jobs

8.12.20  6:59 am   what do you think is an unpopular opinion??

      trash is really fresh

8.12.20  6:17 am   Assuming you have a set of ears, capable of hearing complex variety of sounds, language and musical literature, in your personal opinion based on what you have listened to, what is the best album you have heard with given set of ears? 

      if you put it that way, ......... i have never heard a good album

8.12.20  6:11 am   What is the definiton of a monkey

      it can be redefined with each new day

8.12.20  5:49 am   do you know anyone else who types in (mostly) all lowercase

      yes, everyone. including you

8.12.20  5:48 am   i do not know how mixing works. if you record one instrument, and then another, they should just automatically blend in. i dont know what else to say.  my point is just that i dont think mixing should ever have to happen

      it doesn't, if you think it already sounds good

8.12.20  5:34 am   is cardboard funny?

      if you fold it just right

8.12.20  5:11 am   where was the unusual time zone from the airport terminal?

      it can be an unusual time zone for people in airport terminals because they may have traveled there from a far away place

8.12.20  4:58 am   Is there meaning to most of your lyrics,

     yes

     or are they nonsense?

     try it with the music. that's where the meaning should happen, if you're gonna get it

8.12.20  4:51 am   what is the origin of the humans

      lightning, maybe

8.12.20  4:39 am   what's the best time?

      9:99

8.12.20  4:29 am   Which superpower would you choose?

      being normal

8.12.20  3:46 am   Why is everything you do so psychedelic and abstract?

      it's apparently the only thing i'm capable of

8.12.20  2:52 am   How to exit the enterance

      enter the exit

8.12.20  2:30 am   What are you working on?

      songs

8.12.20  2:13 am   what is your opinion on wearing socks and sandals

      not since pineapple and pizza have i seen a more perfect combination

8.12.20  1:56 am   Hey have you complety forgotten the song because you didn't write it down

      i write down as much as possible. if the ideas come literally too fast to write down, then those will be missed. i would estimate that an average of 2% of music is missed, which i think is a fantastically low percentage, which i am pleased with. especially because, paradoxically, ideas seem to only want to come when they think you're not gonna be able to write them down

8.12.20  1:31 am   Hi Bill -- I'm trying to write a webcomic. I have this problem where I keep going back and rewriting/redrawing previous pages because I'm a perfectionist and it feels like nothing I make is good enough. My question is, have you ever published a video that you weren't satisfied with

     of course

     and you just kept editing it over and over?

     no, i've never edited anything after releasing it

      And how did you eventually decide to just publish it? Thanks.

8.12.20  1:27 am   How do you come up with melodies and harmonies so good to hear ?

      i have to pretend i'm not trying

8.12.20  12:54 am   would you say you're properly prepared for a potential zombie apocalypse???

     i'm not sure

      what's your weapon of choice?

     zombie apocalypse merchandise

8.12.20  12:27 am   why do you type in lowercase

      most people do, especially you

8.12.20  12:21 am   what kind of dreams do you have?

      last night i had a dream that toast was sold in a package, already as toast. i was not as excited about this as some of my peers

8.12.20  12:05 am   what is your oldest incomplete project?

      my self

8.12.20  12:03 am   What do you do when other people question your vibe?

      throw a tantrum

8.12.20  12:00 am   would you recommend eating gold

      no

8.11.20  11:45 pm   would you consider a computer program, a mathematical proof, a cooking recipe, or a design for a mechanical device to be art?

      sure but this distinction is hardly what counts

8.11.20  11:37 pm   any plans for a full length album?

     maybe something better, if possible

      or do you find your videos to be an essential part of the equation? or both.... video album?

8.11.20  11:25 pm   BILL are you secretly a potato 

      i either don't know or can't tell you

8.11.20  11:12 pm   Lying is bad

      i believe you

8.11.20  10:43 pm   What should I do next?

      what did you do previously

8.11.20  10:32 pm   When working on a project, if you hit a wall either mentally or physically how do you get past it? I've tried phazing through it and I ended up just wasting time 

      i think you need to open up a more direct line of communication between you now and you who originally decided to do the project

8.11.20  10:22 pm   is your keyboard still upside down?

      no

8.11.20  10:03 pm   what is your opinion on people

      i'm impressed

8.11.20  10:03 pm   hey bill if you were a cucumber what type of cucumber would you be

      i don't know any of the types

8.11.20  9:57 pm   What can I do to improve as a person?

      whichever ways you are not good, do the opposite of that
